name: Remnant of the Dreadwing
description: The formless beast that soared through the starless void should never have required organs this world calls "wings." Those grotesque, profane appendages may have arisen to adapt to the laws beneath the moon, or perhaps they are merely the distorted fragment of its true form that mortal eyes are able to witness.
source: Dropped by Lv. 30+ Lords of the Hidden Depths: Whisperer of Nightmares
